snippet: Kevin Garnett made 11 of 14 shots as Boston shot 60.6 percent from the field to win at Miami.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Boston Celtics defeat Miami Heat, 115-107; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Garnett made 11 of 14 shots as Boston shot 60.6 percent from the field to win at Miami.

headline.seo: With Howard Still Sidelined, Magic Lose
headline.main: Hot Shooting Lifts Celtics Past the Heat
headline.print_headline: Hot Shooting Lifts Celtics Past the Heat
